|                |    1      |   2    |   3    |    4      |     5       |    6     |    7     |

Final Solution:
1. The owner of the goldfish is on the left or right of the fan of salsa.
2. The owner of the dog is not the fan of house.
3. The owner of the cat is on the far right.
4. The owner of the cat is on the left or right of the fan of dubstep.
5. The owner of the horse is somewhere to the left of the fan of r&b.
6. The fan of salsa is not to the left of the fan of ambient.
7. The fan of salsa is on the left or right of the owner of the goldfish.
8. The owner of the dog is on the left or right of the fan of reggae.
9. The owner of the horse is between the fan of ambient and the owner of the rat.
10. The fan of r&b is somewhere to the right of the fan of house.
11. The fan of r&b is not to the left of the fan of salsa.
12. The owner of the cat is not to the right of the fan of country.
13. The fan of reggae is not to the left of the owner of the hedgehog.
14. The owner of the dog is between the fan of reggae and the owner of the cat.
15. The fan of ambient is in an odd position.
16. The owner of the chinchilla is not to the left of the owner of the horse.
17. The fan of salsa is on the left of the fan of r&b.
18. The fan of country is somewhere to the right of the fan of house.
